description:
In honor of the Civilian Conservation Corps youth who helped shape the modern National Park System, Darn Tough made the Northwoods hiking sock to work hard. But hard labor is no match for their soft, snug fit. Sure, they'll crush trails like a pound of dynamite, but with details like breathable cushioning and low-profile, slouch-free 1x1 ribbing, the only grunt you'll make is when the wildlife tries to steal these socks.

  • Women's micro crew socks average 7.5 in. from heel to cuff - expect them to show about 5 in. above a low hiking shoe or just above a standard hiking boot
  • A performance fit means no slipping, no bunching, no blisters for peak hiking comfort
  • Merino Wool is at home on the trail, naturally moving moisture to keep feet fresh and dry in all weather
  • All-season weight, midweight socks thermoregulate to wrap feet in steady comfort when temperatures change
  • The “still” in Still Made in Vermont, USA is personal. Darn Tough knit all their socks at their Vermont based Mills
name: Darn Tough Northwoods Midweight Micro Crew Socks - Women's
